system.description: This spell functions like silent image, except that the figment includes visual, auditory, olfactory, and thermal elements, and the figment follows a script determined by you. The figment follows that script without your having to concentrate on it. The illusion can react to the actions of creatures that interact with it, as long as you can see or hear what is going on. If you cease to observe the figment, it continues to follow the script. The figment can be of any object, creature, or force, as long as it fits in a 20-foot cube. Disbelieving the illusion causes it to become transparent.

components.materialDescription: A bit of fleece plus powdered jade worth at least 25 gp.

system.target: Visual figment that cannot extend beyond a 20-ft. cube
